title: The Raaga Ruby and Diamond Earrings - A Symphony of Tradition and Sparkle
features: Intricate filigree design reminiscent of traditional South Indian motifs, bezel-set ruby center stone surrounded by pave-set diamonds. The openwork design ensures comfortable wear while maximizing light reflection for exceptional brilliance. The gold has been hand polished to give an antique look, and then a final Hyderabadi polish has been applied to make it shiny.
occasions: and modern formal events. Also suitable to add a touch of luxury to everyday outfits.
description: A timeless piece showcasing exquisite craftsmanship and gemstone quality. The combination of ruby and diamond is considered highly auspicious in South Indian culture, making this earrings a valuable heirloom. The classic design allows it to be paired with both traditional and contemporary attire. It represents a perfect blend of South Indian heritage and modern design sensibilities. Designed to last a lifetime.
